alert.note: Alert for Barron; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 10:22PM CDT until May 11 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Rusk County in northwestern Wisconsin... Eastern Barron County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1021 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Rice Lake, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Weyerhaeuser around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bruce. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Wisconsin.
